# CoPilot Instructions for Olive Vine Dental

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 14 (App Router) - Server Components default.
- React Three Fiber (R3F) & Drei - Performance critical.
- GSAP - Animations.
- CSS Modules - No Tailwind.
- Sanity.io - CMS.

## Rules
- Use `use client` only when necessary.
- Compress models (Draco).
- Use `instancedMesh` for particles.
- Clean up GSAP in `useEffect`.
- Strict TypeScript.
